title: world does not save and load consistently

content.raw:
I created the following world using only the brick box, and saved it as an .sdf file:

![Screen Shot 2017-06-05 at 10.37.38 PM.jpg](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/2802102848-Screen_Shot_2017-06-05_at_10.37.38_PM.jpg)


I then exited gazebo and ran:

```
gazebo-8.1.1 -u /Users/athundt/model_editor_models/brick_box_world/brick_box_world.sdf
```

This loaded the following world, where the brick wall clearly differs from the world I saved:

![Screen Shot 2017-06-05 at 10.39.47 PM.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/3618127132-Screen_Shot_2017-06-05_at_10.39.47_PM.png)

I've attached the saved file `brick_box_world.sdf`. This was done with the gazebo 8.1.1 default homebrew installation on OS X.

I created the following world using only the brick box, and saved it as an .sdf file:

I then exited gazebo and ran:

gazebo-8.1.1 -u /Users/athundt/model_editor_models/brick_box_world/brick_box_world.sdf

This loaded the following world, where the brick wall clearly differs from the world I saved:

I've attached the saved file brick_box_world.sdf. This was done with the gazebo 8.1.1 default homebrew installation on OS X.
